messages: Your dreams make you want to build something.
You dream of flying around a giant flower.
Your dreams leave you with an imaginary buzzing noise that fades away.
You dream of a legion of bees sacrificing themselves to save you.
Your dreams leave you imagining elaborate construction projects for insects.
You dream of impaling a giant zombie with your stinger.
You dream of an army of bee drones creating a statue of you in your honor.
A war is waged in your dreams between the undead and a legion of bees at your command. You win in the end.
